high_descs: turn around, walk over to the dresser in the far left corner
pick up the clock that is on the dresser
hold it up to the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a clock with a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the dresser at the foot of the bed.
Pick up the alarm clock on the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at an alarm clock by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn and go to the dresser that is at the foot of the bed.
Pick up the silver object that looks like an alarm clock to the right of the lamp.
With the clock in hand move to your left so you are in front of the lamp that is on the dresser.
While holding the clock turn the lamp on so you can see the clock.
anns.task_desc: Turn lamp on to look at clock.
